text: ham allaah par jhooth ghadanevaale thaharenge, yadi tumhaare panth mein laut aaen, isake baad ki allaah ne hamen usase chhutakaara de diya hai. yah hamase to hone ka nahin ki ham usamen palat kar jaen, balki hamaare rab allaah kee ichchha hee kriyaanvit hai. gyaan kee spasht se hamaara rab har cheez ko apane ghere mein lie hue hai. hamane allaah hee par bharosa kiya hai. hamaare rab, hamaare aur hamaaree qaum ke beech nishchit atal faisala kar de. aur too sabase achchha faisala karanevaala hai.
